metadata.Title: CVE-2020-9794 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking. Thisissue is fixed in iOS 13.5 and iPadOS 13.5, macOS Catalina 10.15.5, tvOS13.4.5, watchOS 6.2.5, iTunes 12.10.7 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 11.2,iCloud for Windows 7.19. A malicious application may cause a denial ofservice or potentially disclose memory contents.

criterions.comment: sqlite: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
sqlite3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
